bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">php</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> artisan</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> nova:user</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<span data-as="p">That’s it! Next, you may navigate to your application’s <code>/nova</code> path in your browser and you should be greeted with the Nova dashboard which includes links to various parts of this documentation.</span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="registering-a-nova-license-key-and-production-url"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#registering-a-nova-license-key-and-production-url" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Registering a Nova License Key and Production URL</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Nova requires a license key and a production URL to be used in production environments. Nova will check your license key and the current host against the values from the license details found in your Nova account.</span>
<span data-as="p">You can generate license keys and register the production URL for your project inside the license’s page on your Nova account at <a href="https://nova.laravel.com/licenses" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">https://nova.laravel.com/licenses</a>:</span>
<div><div data-name="frame" class="frame p-2 not-prose relative bg-gray-50/50 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden dark:bg-gray-800/25"><div style="background-position:10px 10px" class="absolute inset-0 bg-grid-neutral-200/20 [mask-image:linear-gradient(0deg,#fff,rgba(255,255,255,0.6))] dark:bg-grid-white/5 dark:[mask-image:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(255,255,255,0.1),rgba(255,255,255,0.5))]"></div><div class="relative rounded-xl overflow-hidden flex justify-center"><span aria-owns="rmiz-modal-" data-rmiz=""><span data-rmiz-content="not-found" style="visibility:visible"><picture class="contents"><img data-path="images/register-site.png" src="https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/bY_66OSFONsRO54M/images/register-site.png?fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=bY_66OSFONsRO54M&amp;q=85&amp;s=bcb0b0aa45a250e99d89be8dabf3e4f1" alt="Registering your production site" class="object-contain" width="2122" height="1840" decoding="async" sizes="(max-width: 840px) 100vw, (max-width: 1100px) 50vw, 33vw" srcSet="https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/bY_66OSFONsRO54M/images/register-site.png?w=280&amp;fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=bY_66OSFONsRO54M&amp;q=85&amp;s=93fa15bc09dc996f2c39d8a62d0299b6 280w, https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/bY_66OSFONsRO54M/images/register-site.png?w=560&amp;fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=bY_66OSFONsRO54M&amp;q=85&amp;s=a81ccce028f175e980814b1be1fadc52 560w, https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/bY_66OSFONsRO54M/images/register-site.png?w=840&amp;fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=bY_66OSFONsRO54M&amp;q=85&amp;s=b1caf9909ba01699597ecfa44b5bde25 840w, https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/bY_66OSFONsRO54M/images/register-site.png?w=1100&amp;fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=bY_66OSFONsRO54M&amp;q=85&amp;s=96ac9416ec233f6cb9a4796a20ccf68b 1100w, https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/bY_66OSFONsRO54M/images/register-site.png?w=1650&amp;fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=bY_66OSFONsRO54M&amp;q=85&amp;s=1c207ccf6f95ee40b55f6fc997933551 1650w, https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/bY_66OSFONsRO54M/images/register-site.png?w=2500&amp;fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=bY_66OSFONsRO54M&amp;q=85&amp;s=1fdfd6e43bad9658434463dc3fe60d23 2500w" data-optimize="true" style="aspect-ratio:2122 / 1840"/></picture></span></span></div><div class="absolute inset-0 pointer-events-none border border-black/5 rounded-2xl dark:border-white/5"></div></div></div>
<div class="callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-sky-500/20 bg-sky-50/50 dark:border-sky-500/30 dark:bg-sky-500/10" data-callout-type="note"><div class="mt-0.5 w-4" data-component-part="callout-icon"><svg width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-sky-500" aria-label="Note"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 1.3C10.14 1.3 12.7 3.86 12.7 7C12.7 10.14 10.14 12.7 7 12.7C5.48908 12.6974 4.0408 12.096 2.97241 11.0276C1.90403 9.9592 1.30264 8.51092 1.3 7C1.3 3.86 3.86 1.3 7 1.3ZM7 0C3.14 0 0 3.14 0 7C0 10.86 3.14 14 7 14C10.86 14 14 10.86 14 7C14 3.14 10.86 0 7 0ZM8 3H6V8H8V3ZM8 9H6V11H8V9Z"></path></svg></div><div class="text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-sky-900 dark:text-sky-200" data-component-part="callout-content"><span data-as="p">You can register a wildcard subdomain for your production URL for use in multi-tenant scenarios (e.g. <code>*.laravel.com</code>).</span></div></div>
<span data-as="p">You can register your license key by setting the <code>NOVA_LICENSE_KEY</code> variable to <code>.env</code> file or <code>license_key</code> option in your <code>config/nova.php</code> configuration file:</span>
<div dir="ltr" data-orientation="horizontal" class="code-group p-0.5 mt-5 mb-8 flex flex-col not-prose relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:codeblock-dark text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light"><div class="flex items-center justify-between gap-2 relative pr-2.5 *:first:*:ml-2.5" data-component-part="code-group-tab-bar"><div role="tablist" aria-orientation="horizontal" class="flex-1 min-w-0 text-xs leading-6 rounded-tl-xl gap-1 flex overflow-x-auto overflow-y-hidden scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" style="outline:none"><button type="button" role="tab" aria-selected="true" aria-controls="radix-_R_21aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-0" data-state="active" id="radix-_R_21aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-0" class="group flex items-center relative gap-1.5 my-1 mb-1.5 outline-0 whitespace-nowrap font-medium !ml-0 first:!ml-2.5 focus:outline-2 text-primary dark:text-primary-light" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" data-radix-collection-item=""><div class="flex items-center gap-1.5 px-1.5 rounded-lg z-10 group-hover:bg-gray-200/50 dark:group-hover:bg-gray-700/70 group-hover:text-primary dark:group-hover:text-primary-light">.env</div><div class="absolute -bottom-1.5 left-0 right-0 h-0.5 rounded-full bg-primary dark:bg-primary-light"></div></button><button type="button" role="tab" aria-selected="false" aria-controls="radix-_R_21aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-1" data-state="inactive" id="radix-_R_21aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-1" class="group flex items-center relative gap-1.5 my-1 mb-1.5 outline-0 whitespace-nowrap font-medium !ml-0 first:!ml-2.5 focus:outline-2 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" data-radix-collection-item=""><div class="flex items-center gap-1.5 px-1.5 rounded-lg z-10 group-hover:bg-gray-200/50 dark:group-hover:bg-gray-700/70 group-hover:text-primary dark:group-hover:text-primary-light">config/nova.php</div></button></div><div class="flex items-center justify-end shrink-0 gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="flex flex-1 overflow-hidden"><div data-state="active" data-orientation="horizontal" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="radix-_R_21aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-0" id="radix-_R_21aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-0" tabindex="-1" class="w-full min-w-full max-w-full h-full max-h-full" style="animation-duration:0s"><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-auto overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:100%;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre flex-none text-sm h-full leading-6" data-component-part="code-group-tab-content"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="ini"><code language="ini" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">NOVA_LICENSE_KEY</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">=</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div><div data-state="inactive" data-orientation="horizontal" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="radix-_R_21aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-1" hidden="" id="radix-_R_21aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-1" tabindex="-1" class="w-full min-w-full max-w-full h-full max-h-full"></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="verifying-your-nova-license-key-configuration"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#verifying-your-nova-license-key-configuration" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Verifying Your Nova License Key Configuration</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">To verify everything has been configured correctly, you should run the <code>nova:check-license</code> command:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="1" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">php</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> artisan</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> nova:check-license</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="authenticating-nova-in-ci-environments"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#authenticating-nova-in-ci-environments" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Authenticating Nova in CI Environments</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">It’s not recommended to store your Composer <code>auth.json</code> file inside your project’s source control repository. However, there may be times you wish to download Nova inside a CI environment like <a href="https://github.com/features/actions" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">GitHub Actions</a>. For instance, you may wish to run tests for any custom tools you create.</span>
<span data-as="p">To authenticate Nova in these situations, you can use Composer’s <code>config</code> command to set the configuration option inside your CI system’s pipeline, injecting environment variables containing your Nova username and license key:</span>
<div dir="ltr" data-orientation="horizontal" class="code-group p-0.5 mt-5 mb-8 flex flex-col not-prose relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:codeblock-dark text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light"><div class="flex items-center justify-between gap-2 relative pr-2.5 *:first:*:ml-2.5" data-component-part="code-group-tab-bar"><div role="tablist" aria-orientation="horizontal" class="flex-1 min-w-0 text-xs leading-6 rounded-tl-xl gap-1 flex overflow-x-auto overflow-y-hidden scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" style="outline:none"><button type="button" role="tab" aria-selected="true" aria-controls="radix-_R_2faislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-0" data-state="active" id="radix-_R_2faislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-0" class="group flex items-center relative gap-1.5 my-1 mb-1.5 outline-0 whitespace-nowrap font-medium !ml-0 first:!ml-2.5 focus:outline-2 text-primary dark:text-primary-light" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" data-radix-collection-item=""><div class="flex items-center gap-1.5 px-1.5 rounded-lg z-10">GitHub Actions</div><div class="absolute -bottom-1.5 left-0 right-0 h-0.5 rounded-full bg-primary dark:bg-primary-light"></div></button></div><div class="flex items-center justify-end shrink-0 gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="flex flex-1 overflow-hidden"><div data-state="active" data-orientation="horizontal" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="radix-_R_2faislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-0" id="radix-_R_2faislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-0" tabindex="-1" class="w-full min-w-full max-w-full h-full max-h-full" style="animation-duration:0s"><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-auto overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:100%;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre flex-none text-sm h-full leading-6" data-component-part="code-group-tab-content"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">composer</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> config</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> http-basic.nova.laravel.com</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> &quot;${</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">secrets</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">.</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">NOVA_USERNAME</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">}&quot;</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> &quot;${</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">secrets</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">.</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">NOVA_LICENSE_KEY</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">}&quot;</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="using-nova-on-development-and-staging-domains"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#using-nova-on-development-and-staging-domains" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Using Nova on Development and Staging Domains</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Since Nova can be used in local and staging development environments, Nova will not check your license key when used on <code>localhost</code> or local TLDs like those specified in <a href="https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc2606#page-2" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">IETF RFC 2606</a>:</span>
<ul>
<li><code>.test</code></li>
<li><code>.example</code></li>
<li><code>.invalid</code></li>
<li><code>.localhost</code></li>
<li><code>.local</code></li>
</ul>
<span data-as="p">Nova will also not check the current license key when the subdomain is one of these commonly-used staging subdomains:</span>
<ul>
<li><code>staging.</code></li>
<li><code>stage.</code></li>
<li><code>test.</code></li>
<li><code>testing.</code></li>
<li><code>dev.</code></li>
<li><code>development.</code></li>
</ul>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="authorizing-access-to-nova"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#authorizing-access-to-nova" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Authorizing Access to Nova</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Within your <code>app/Providers/NovaServiceProvider.php</code> file, there is a <code>gate</code> method. This authorization gate controls access to Nova in <strong>non-local</strong> environments. By default, any user can access the Nova dashboard when the current application environment is <code>local</code>. You are free to modify this gate as needed to restrict access to your Nova installation:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" numberOfLines="17" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">app/Providers/NovaServiceProvider.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="17"><span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">use</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> Illuminate\Support\Facades\</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Gate</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">;</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">// ...</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">/**</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> * Register the Nova gate.</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> *</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> * This gate determines who can access Nova in non-local environments.</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> */</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">protected</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> function</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> gate</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">:</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> void</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">{</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">    Gate</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">define</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&#x27;viewNova&#x27;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">, </span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">function</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> (</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">$user</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">) {</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#C586C0">        return</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> in_array</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">$user</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">email</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">, [</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">            &#x27;<a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="b7c3d6cedbd8c5f7dbd6c5d6c1d2db99d4d8da">[email&#160;protected]</a>&#x27;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">        ]);</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">    });</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="customization"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#customization" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Customization</span></h2>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="branding"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#branding" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Branding</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">Although Nova’s interface is intended to be an isolated part of your application that is managed by Nova, you can make some small customizations to the branding logo and color used by Nova to make the interface more cohesive with the rest of your application.</span>
<div><div data-name="frame" class="frame p-2 not-prose relative bg-gray-50/50 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden dark:bg-gray-800/25"><div style="background-position:10px 10px" class="absolute inset-0 bg-grid-neutral-200/20 [mask-image:linear-gradient(0deg,#fff,rgba(255,255,255,0.6))] dark:bg-grid-white/5 dark:[mask-image:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(255,255,255,0.1),rgba(255,255,255,0.5))]"></div><div class="relative rounded-xl overflow-hidden flex justify-center"><span aria-owns="rmiz-modal-" data-rmiz=""><span data-rmiz-content="not-found" style="visibility:visible"><picture class="contents"><img data-path="images/branding.png" src="https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/ISBJ63muGLVA9l3K/images/branding.png?fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=ISBJ63muGLVA9l3K&amp;q=85&amp;s=94793e431e9aa3202fd99709cb8de43e" alt="Branding" class="object-contain" width="3456" height="1832" decoding="async" sizes="(max-width: 840px) 100vw, (max-width: 1100px) 50vw, 33vw" srcSet="https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/ISBJ63muGLVA9l3K/images/branding.png?w=280&amp;fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=ISBJ63muGLVA9l3K&amp;q=85&amp;s=1df53117469f3f878a1d7fd4d4a7e825 280w, https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/ISBJ63muGLVA9l3K/images/branding.png?w=1100&amp;fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=ISBJ63muGLVA9l3K&amp;q=85&amp;s=a139fbd0f2c44ec85b94d5b6cd081365 1100w, https://mintcdn.com/nova-laravel/ISBJ63muGLVA9l3K/images/branding.png?w=1650&amp;fit=max&amp;auto=format&amp;n=ISBJ63muGLVA9l3K&amp;q=85&amp;s=5fe8cec96e23dcdd078919bf908071a0 1650w, data-optimize="true" style="aspect-ratio:3456 / 1832"/></picture></span></span></div><div class="absolute inset-0 pointer-events-none border border-black/5 rounded-2xl dark:border-white/5"></div></div></div>
<h4 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="brand-logo"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#brand-logo" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Brand Logo</span></h4>
<span data-as="p">To customize the logo used at the top left of the Nova interface, you may specify a configuration value for the <code>brand.logo</code> configuration item within your application’s <code>config/nova.php</code> configuration file. This configuration value should contain an absolute path to the SVG file of the logo you would like to use:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" numberOfLines="5" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">config/nova.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="5"><span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&#x27;brand&#x27;</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> =&gt;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> [</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">    &#x27;logo&#x27;</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> =&gt;</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> resource_path</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&#x27;/img/example-logo.svg&#x27;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">),</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">    // ...</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">],</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<div class="callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-sky-500/20 bg-sky-50/50 dark:border-sky-500/30 dark:bg-sky-500/10" data-callout-type="note"><div class="mt-0.5 w-4" data-component-part="callout-icon"><svg width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-sky-500" aria-label="Note"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 1.3C10.14 1.3 12.7 3.86 12.7 7C12.7 10.14 10.14 12.7 7 12.7C5.48908 12.6974 4.0408 12.096 2.97241 11.0276C1.90403 9.9592 1.30264 8.51092 1.3 7C1.3 3.86 3.86 1.3 7 1.3ZM7 0C3.14 0 0 3.14 0 7C0 10.86 3.14 14 7 14C10.86 14 14 10.86 14 7C14 3.14 10.86 0 7 0ZM8 3H6V8H8V3ZM8 9H6V11H8V9Z"></path></svg></div><div class="text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-sky-900 dark:text-sky-200" data-component-part="callout-content"><span data-as="p">You may need to adjust the size and width of your SVG logo by modifying its width in the SVG file itself.</span></div></div>
<h4 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="brand-color"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#brand-color" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Brand Color</span></h4>
<span data-as="p">To customize the color used as the “primary” color within the Nova interface, you may specify a value for the <code>brand.colors</code> configuration item within your application’s <code>config/nova.php</code> configuration file. This color will be used as the primary button color as well as the color of various emphasized items throughout the Nova interface. This configuration value should be a valid RGB, RGBA, or HSL string value:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" numberOfLines="9" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">config/nova.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="9"><span class="line"><span <span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">    // ...</span></span>

<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">        &quot;400&quot;</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> =&gt;</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> &quot;24, 182, 155, 0.5&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">        &quot;500&quot;</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> =&gt;</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> &quot;24, 182, 155&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">        &quot;600&quot;</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> =&gt;</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> &quot;24, 182, 155, 0.75&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">    ]</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">],</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="customizing-nova%E2%80%99s-footer"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#customizing-nova%E2%80%99s-footer" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Customizing Nova’s Footer</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">There are times you may wish to customize Nova’s default footer text to include relevant information for your users, such as your application version, IP addresses, or other information. Using the <code>Nova::footer</code> method, you may customize the footer text of your Nova installation. Typically, the <code>footer</code> method should be called within the <code>boot</code> method of your application’s <code>App\Providers\NovaServiceProvider</code> class:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" numberOfLines="21" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">app/Providers/NovaServiceProvider.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="21"><span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">use</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> Illuminate\Http\</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Request</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">;</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">use</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> Illuminate\Support\Facades\</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Blade</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">;</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">use</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> Laravel\Nova\</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Nova</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">;</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">// ...</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">/**</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> * Boot any application services.</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> */</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">public</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> function</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> boot</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">:</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> void</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">{</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">    parent</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">boot</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">    Nova</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">footer</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">function</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> (</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Request</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> $request</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">) {</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#C586C0">        return</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0"> Blade</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">render</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&#x27;</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">            @env(</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D7BA7D">\&#x27;</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">prod</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D7BA7D">\&#x27;</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">)</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                This is production!</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">            @endenv</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">        &#x27;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">);</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">    });</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="customizing-nova%E2%80%99s-authentication-guard"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#customizing-nova%E2%80%99s-authentication-guard" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Customizing Nova’s Authentication Guard</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">Nova uses the default authentication guard defined in your <code>auth</code> configuration file. If you would like to customize this guard, you may set the <code>NOVA_GUARD</code> value using <code>.env</code> file or <code>guard</code> value within Nova’s configuration file:</span>
<div dir="ltr" data-orientation="horizontal" class="code-group p-0.5 mt-5 mb-8 flex flex-col not-prose relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:codeblock-dark text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light"><div class="flex items-center justify-between gap-2 relative pr-2.5 *:first:*:ml-2.5" data-component-part="code-group-tab-bar"><div role="tablist" aria-orientation="horizontal" class="flex-1 min-w-0 text-xs leading-6 rounded-tl-xl gap-1 flex overflow-x-auto overflow-y-hidden scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" style="outline:none"><button type="button" role="tab" aria-selected="true" aria-controls="radix-_R_41aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-0" data-state="active" id="radix-_R_41aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-0" class="group flex items-center relative gap-1.5 my-1 mb-1.5 outline-0 whitespace-nowrap font-medium !ml-0 first:!ml-2.5 focus:outline-2 text-primary dark:text-primary-light" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" data-radix-collection-item=""><div class="flex -bottom-1.5 left-0 right-0 h-0.5 rounded-full bg-primary dark:bg-primary-light"></div></button><button type="button" role="tab" aria-selected="false" aria-controls="radix-_R_41aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-1" data-state="inactive" id="radix-_R_41aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-1" class="group flex items-center relative gap-1.5 my-1 mb-1.5 outline-0 whitespace-nowrap font-medium !ml-0 first:!ml-2.5 focus:outline-2 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" data-radix-collection-item=""><div class="flex items-center gap-1.5 px-1.5 rounded-lg z-10 group-hover:bg-gray-200/50 dark:group-hover:bg-gray-700/70 group-hover:text-primary dark:group-hover:text-primary-light">config/nova.php</div></button></div><div class="flex items-center justify-end shrink-0 gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap overflow-hidden"><div data-state="active" data-orientation="horizontal" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="radix-_R_41aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-0" id="radix-_R_41aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-0" tabindex="-1" class="w-full min-w-full max-w-full h-full max-h-full" style="animation-duration:0s"><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-auto overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:100%;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre flex-none text-sm h-full leading-6" data-component-part="code-group-tab-content"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="ini"><code language="ini" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">NOVA_GUARD</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">=(null)</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div><div data-state="inactive" data-orientation="horizontal" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="radix-_R_41aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-1" hidden="" id="radix-_R_41aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-1" tabindex="-1" class="w-full min-w-full max-w-full h-full max-h-full"></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="customizing-nova%E2%80%99s-storage-disk-driver"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#customizing-nova%E2%80%99s-storage-disk-driver" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Customizing Nova’s Storage Disk Driver</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">Nova uses the default storage disk driver defined in your <code>filesystems</code> configuration file. If you would like to customize this disk, you may set the <code>NOVA_STORAGE_DISK</code> value using <code>.env</code> file the <code>storage_disk</code> value within Nova’s configuration file:</span>
<div dir="ltr" data-orientation="horizontal" class="code-group p-0.5 mt-5 mb-8 flex flex-col not-prose relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:codeblock-dark text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light"><div class="flex items-center justify-between gap-2 relative pr-2.5 *:first:*:ml-2.5" data-component-part="code-group-tab-bar"><div role="tablist" aria-orientation="horizontal" class="flex-1 min-w-0 text-xs leading-6 rounded-tl-xl gap-1 flex overflow-x-auto overflow-y-hidden scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" style="outline:none"><button type="button" role="tab" aria-selected="true" aria-controls="radix-_R_47aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-0" data-state="active" id="radix-_R_47aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-0" class="group flex items-center relative gap-1.5 my-1 mb-1.5 outline-0 whitespace-nowrap font-medium !ml-0 first:!ml-2.5 focus:outline-2 text-primary dark:text-primary-light" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" data-radix-collection-item=""><div class="flex items-center gap-1.5 px-1.5 rounded-lg z-10 group-hover:bg-gray-200/50 dark:group-hover:bg-gray-700/70 group-hover:text-primary dark:group-hover:text-primary-light">.env</div><div class="absolute -bottom-1.5 left-0 right-0 h-0.5 rounded-full bg-primary dark:bg-primary-light"></div></button><button type="button" role="tab" aria-selected="false" aria-controls="radix-_R_47aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-1" data-state="inactive" id="radix-_R_47aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-1" class="group flex items-center relative gap-1.5 my-1 mb-1.5 outline-0 whitespace-nowrap font-medium !ml-0 first:!ml-2.5 focus:outline-2 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400" tabindex="-1" data-orientation="horizontal" data-radix-collection-item=""><div class="flex items-center gap-1.5 px-1.5 rounded-lg z-10 group-hover:bg-gray-200/50 dark:group-hover:bg-gray-700/70 group-hover:text-primary dark:group-hover:text-primary-light">config/nova.php</div></button></div><div class="flex items-center justify-end shrink-0 gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button "
