overflow-hidden"><div data-state="active" data-orientation="horizontal" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="radix-_R_47aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-0" id="radix-_R_47aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-0" tabindex="-1" class="w-full min-w-full max-w-full h-full max-h-full" style="animation-duration:0s"><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-auto overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:100%;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre flex-none text-sm h-full leading-6" data-component-part="code-group-tab-content"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="ini"><code language="ini" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">NOVA_STORAGE_DISK</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">=public</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div><div data-state="inactive" data-orientation="horizontal" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="radix-_R_47aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-trigger-1" hidden="" id="radix-_R_47aislubr6kutqbsnpfdb_-content-1" tabindex="-1" class="w-full min-w-full max-w-full h-full max-h-full"></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="customizing-nova%E2%80%99s-initial-path"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#customizing-nova%E2%80%99s-initial-path" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Customizing Nova’s Initial Path</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">When visiting Nova, the <code>Main</code> dashboard is typically loaded by default. However, you are free to define a different initial path that should be loaded using Nova’s <code>initialPath</code> method. Typically, this method may be invoked from the <code>register</code> method of your application’s <code>App\Providers\NovaServiceProvider</code> service provider:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" highlight="[8]" numberOfLines="11" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">app/Providers/NovaServiceProvider.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto has-highlighted scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="11"><span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">/**</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> * Register any application services.</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> */</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">public</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> function</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> register</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">:</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> void</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">{</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">    parent</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">register</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">    Nova</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">initialPath</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&#x27;/resources/users&#x27;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">);</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">    // ...</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<span data-as="p">In addition to a string path, the <code>initialPath</code> method also accepts a closure that returns the path that should be loaded. This allows you to dynamically determine the initial path based on the incoming request:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" highlight="[8,9,10]" numberOfLines="13" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">app/Providers/NovaServiceProvider.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="13"><span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">/**</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> * Register any application services.</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> */</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">public</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> function</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> register</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">:</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> void</span></span>

<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">    Nova</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">initialPath</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">function</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> (</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">$request</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">) {</span></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#C586C0">        return</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> $request</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">user</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">initialPath</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">    });</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">    // ...</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="enabling-breadcrumbs"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#enabling-breadcrumbs" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Enabling Breadcrumbs</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">If you would like Nova to display a “breadcrumb” menu as you navigate your Nova dashboard, you may invoke the <code>Nova::withBreadcrumbs</code> method. This method should be invoked from within the <code>boot</code> method of your application’s <code>App\Providers\NovaServiceProvider</code> class:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" highlight="[8]" numberOfLines="9" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">app/Providers/NovaServiceProvider.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto has-highlighted scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="9"><span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">/**</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> * Boot any application services.</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> */</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">public</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> function</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> boot</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">:</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> void</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">{</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">    parent</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">boot</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">    Nova</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">withBreadcrumbs</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<span data-as="p">The <code>withBreadcrumbs</code> method also accepts a closure that allows you to enable breadcrumbs for specific users or other custom scenarios:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" highlight="[6,7,8]" numberOfLines="8" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">app/Providers/NovaServiceProvider.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto has-highlighted scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="8"><span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">use</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> Laravel\Nova\Http\Requests\</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">NovaRequest</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">;</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">use</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> Laravel\Nova\</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Nova</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">;</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">// ...</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Nova</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">withBreadcrumbs</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">function</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> (</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">NovaRequest</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> $request</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">) {</span></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#C586C0">    return</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> $request</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">user</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">wantsBreadcrumbs</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">});</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="enabling-rtl-support"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#enabling-rtl-support" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Enabling RTL Support</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">If you wish to display Nova’s content “right-to-left” (RTL), you can enable this behavior by calling the <code>enableRTL</code> method from your <code>App\Providers\NovaServiceProvider</code> service provider:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" highlight="[8]" numberOfLines="9" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">app/Providers/NovaServiceProvider.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto has-highlighted scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="9"><span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">/**</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> * Boot any application services.</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> */</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">public</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> function</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> boot</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">:</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> void</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> </span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">{</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">    parent</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">boot</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">    Nova</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">enableRTL</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<span data-as="p">The <code>enableRTL</code> method also accept a closure that allows you to enable RTL support for specific users or in other custom scenarios:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="6" language="php"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="6"><span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">use</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> Illuminate\Http\</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Request</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">;</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">use</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> Laravel\Nova\</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Nova</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">;</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">// ...</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Nova</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">enableRTL</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">fn</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> (</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">Request</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> $request</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">) =&gt; </span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">$request</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">user</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">wantsRTL</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">());</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="disabling-nova%E2%80%99s-theme-switcher"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#disabling-nova%E2%80%99s-theme-switcher" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Disabling Nova’s Theme Switcher</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">If you wish to completely hide Nova’s light/dark mode switcher and instead have Nova honor the system preference only, you can call the <code>withoutThemeSwitcher</code> method from your <code>App/Providers/NovaServiceProvider</code>:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" highlight="[8]" numberOfLines="9" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto has-highlighted scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="9"><span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">/**</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> * Boot any application services.</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> */</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">public</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> function</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> boot</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">:</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> void</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">{</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">    parent</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">boot</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">    Nova</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">withoutThemeSwitcher</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="error-reporting"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#error-reporting" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Error Reporting</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Nova uses its own internal exception handler instead of using the default <code>App\Exceptions\ExceptionHandler</code>. If you need to integrate third-party error reporting tools with your Nova installation, you should use the <code>Nova::report</code> method. Typically, this method should be invoked from the <code>register</code> method of your application’s <code>App\Providers\NovaServiceProvider</code> class:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" highlight="[8,9,10,11,12]" numberOfLines="13" language="php"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">app/Providers/NovaServiceProvider.php</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto has-highlighted scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="php"><code language="php" numberOfLines="13"><span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955">/**</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> * Register any application services.</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#6E7781;--shiki-dark:#6A9955"> */</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">public</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> function</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA"> register</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">:</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> void</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">{</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">    parent</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">register</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#4EC9B0">    Nova</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">::</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">report</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#569CD6">function</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> (</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">$exception</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">) {</span></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#C586C0">        if</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4"> (</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">app</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">()</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">bound</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&#x27;sentry&#x27;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">)) {</span></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">            app</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&#x27;sentry&#x27;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">)</span><span style="color:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#8250DF;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">captureException</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">(</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">$exception</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">);</span></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">        }</span></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">    });</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="updating-nova"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#updating-nova" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Updating Nova</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">To update your Nova installation, you may run the <code>composer update</code> command:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="1" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">composer</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> update</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="updating-nova%E2%80%99s-assets"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#updating-nova%E2%80%99s-assets" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Updating Nova’s Assets</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">After updating to a new Nova release, you should be sure to update Nova’s JavaScript and CSS assets using the <code>nova:publish</code> Artisan command and clear any cached views using the <code>view:clear</code> Artisan command. This will ensure the newly-updated Nova version is using the latest versions of Nova’s assets and views:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="2" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="2"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">php</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> artisan</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> nova:publish</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">php</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> artisan</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> view:clear</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<span data-as="p">The <code>nova:publish</code> command will re-publish Nova’s public assets, configuration, views, and language files. This command will not overwrite any existing configuration, views, or language files. If you would like the command to overwrite existing files, you may use the <code>--force</code> flag when executing the command:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="1" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">php</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> artisan</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> nova:publish</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> --force</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="keeping-nova%E2%80%99s-assets-updated"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#keeping-nova%E2%80%99s-assets-updated" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Keeping Nova’s Assets Updated</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">To ensure Nova’s assets are updated when a new version is downloaded, you may add a Composer hook inside your project’s <code>composer.json</code> file to automatically publish Nova’s latest assets:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-white/5 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark p-0.5" highlight="[4]" numberOfLines="6" language="json"><div class="flex text-gray-400 text-xs rounded-t-[14px] leading-6 font-medium pl-4 pr-2.5 py-1" data-component-part="code-block-header"><div class="flex-none flex items-center gap-1.5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300" data-component-part="code-block-header-filename">composer.json</div><div class="flex-1 flex items-center justify-end gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-xt bg-white overflow-x-auto has-highlighted scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#FFFFFF;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="json"><code language="json" numberOfLines="6"><span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&quot;scripts&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: {</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">    &quot;post-update-cmd&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: [</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">        &quot;@php artisan vendor:publish --tag=laravel-assets --ansi --force&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line line-highlight"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">        &quot;@php artisan nova:publish --ansi&quot;</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">    ]</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="code-distribution"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#code-distribution" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Code Distribution</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Nova’s license does not allow the public distribution of its source code. So, you may not build an application using Nova and distribute that application public via open source repository hosting platforms or any other code distribution platform.</span>
<span data-as="p">If you would like to develop a third party package that augments Nova’s functionality, you are free to do so. However, you may not distribute the Nova source code along with your package.</span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="legal-and-compliance"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#legal-and-compliance" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">​<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Legal and Compliance</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Our <a href="https://nova.laravel.com/terms" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Terms of Service</a> and <a href="https://nova.laravel.com/privacy" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Privacy Policy</a> provide details on the terms, conditions, and privacy practices for using Laravel Nova.</span></div><div class="feedback-toolbar pb-16 w-full flex
